channel.title: Noobscape Restart command?
channel.description: how would you make a command that restarts the server. ::update just shuts it down, so mods could restart it when no admins are on

item.title: Noobscape Restart command?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

bloodyp2p:

[size=15pt]how would you make a command that restarts the server.[/size] ::update just shuts it down, so mods could restart it when no admins are on

How could you miss that:S

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape Restart command?
item.dc:creator: @Phenominal Phenominal
item.description:
@Phenominal wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:4, topic:312020”][quote author=Phenominal link=topic=408464.msg3016527#msg3016527 date=1257228085]

how would you make a command that restarts the server. ::update just shuts it down, so mods could restart it when no admins are on

There’s no way to use a command to restart the server when the server itself is down…
[/quote]
yes to can make a command to restart. ::restart it closes and open again.[/quote]
Oh restart, I thought he meant when the server was down. XD

Read full topic

how would you make a command that restarts the server. ::update just shuts it down, so mods could restart it when no admins are on
[/quote]
There’s no way to use a command to restart the server when the server itself is down…[/quote]
yes to can make a command to restart. ::restart it closes and open again.
